mention.text: O wild-birds , flying from the South , What saw and
The sickened camp , the blazing town
Low stooping from the cloudy gray
The crash of Slavery 's broken locks
uprising States The treason-nursing mischief spurned , As , crowding Freedom 's ample gates , The long-estranged
